title: SEPT 1st, 3 Bed 2 FULL Bath, Central AC, Private Deck, In-Unit Laundry
posting_body: ['Available for September 1st...', 'Condo quality unit, located on the third floor of a 3-Family house, right in the heart of Oak Square.', 'Conveniently along 4 major bus lines (#64, #57, #501, and #503), close to major roadways, and countless storefronts, entertainment, and more.', 'This unit has it all!', 'Central AC, private outdoor space, granite/stainless kitchen, 2 Full Baths, In-Unit Laundry, and extra storage!!', 'The apartment blends a contemporary renovation and floor plan, while still maintaining character and charm.', 'There is an open flow between the kitchen, dining room, and living area.', 'The kitchen is absolutely flawless with loads of granite counter tops (including a large breakfast bar) as well as stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, disposal, gas cooking range, fridge/freezer, and built-in microwave), and tasteful finishes and tile back-splash.', 'The living room is very large with front-facing bay windows overlooking Oak Square, getting great light throughout the day and also offering loads of space for entertaining.', 'The living room opens up to a large dining area which then connects to the kitchen.', 'This is an excellent layout for entertaining and socializing.', 'All three bedrooms are large, including a Master Bedroom with private en-suite bathroom featuring a jacuzzi tub, pedestal sink, and beautiful tile finishes.', 'The other two bedrooms have access to a second full bathroom and both are equivalent in size.', 'There are nice hardwood floors throughout the unit, central air conditioning, WASHER/DRYER in the apartment, basement storage, and a private front and rear decks.', 'Tenant pays gas heat and hot water.', 'First months rent and a 1-month security deposit are required to move in.', 'There is also a 1- month brokerage fee.', 'No smoking and no pets please.', '*VIDEO-TOUR AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST*', 'To see this apartment, please email Matt']
